1.title: Audere Est Facere - To Dare Is To Do

episode of.title: The Long Ride Home with Bear Woznick (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: World Champ Surfer Bear Woznick & young sidekick Tony Orband roll thunder on their motorcycles heading out from the Atlantic Coast of Florida on their way to the Pacific Coast of California, but not before they pass through the eye of Hurricane Matthew.

2.title: Fortis Voluntas Fratronitas - The Strong Will of Brotherhood

episode of.title: The Long Ride Home with Bear Woznick (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: World Champ Surfer Bear Woznick & young sidekick Tony Orband make it on their motorcycles to the place where Bear ended his Pacific to the Atlantic Ocean bicycle ride in FL 15 years earlier. Then they head west, returning on the same route that he had pedaled. Bear recalls a dramatic moment from his bicycle ride.

3.title: Imageo Dei - Image of God

episode of.title: The Long Ride Home with Bear Woznick (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: World Champ Surfer Bear Woznick & Tony Orband meet up with some bikers just west of Beloxi. They decide to escort them all the way to Houston. They head down to the brothels with Jason Jones carrying a big cross as they pray for the end of sex industry. A pimp and his enforcer show up. As they continue to roll west, Dan'l crashes.

4.title: Coragio - Courage

episode of.title: The Long Ride Home with Bear Woznick (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot:

5.title: Te Absolvo- I Forgive You

episode of.title: The Long Ride Home with Bear Woznick (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: At long last Bear Woznick, World Champ Surfer and the pack rolls into the Big Bend country. In the morning, they rise early to pray on a big mesa. Then they roll out on their first ride through the Big Bend, but Timothy has something else in mind. In the morning they are confronted by the local sheriff.

6.title: Invectus Maneo - I Remain Unvanquished

episode of.title: The Long Ride Home with Bear Woznick (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: World Champ Surfer Bear Woznick and the pack roll thunder early and heads up to the Mesa again long before dawn. They seek out silent solitude and prayer along the ridge line before the sunrise and then their voices are heard echoing down the canyon as they shout from the ridge line to each other the rallying cry of the Cristeros: "Viva Christo Rey" Long Live Christ The King.

7.title: Ubi Concordia Ibi I Victoria- Where There is Unity There is Victory

episode of.title: The Long Ride Home with Bear Woznick (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Grady and Padre Mark talk about the "One Thing", that God requires of a man. But afterward after the men roll out for a ride through the Big Bend, Grady goes missing. Jerry & Dennis can't believe what they see when they discover him.

8.title: Fortis in Ardus - Strong in Adversity

episode of.title: The Long Ride Home with Bear Woznick (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: In the early morning, the pack splits up with Bear & Tony heading west for the Pacific Ocean without the rest of the pack, while the other men peel off in a pack at a juncture and head back to Houston. Bear wonders if they will see the distance cyclist Archie again. They into New Mexico, Bear looks forward to stopping in Las Cruces which is where his first child Fawn was born.

9.title: Quod Deua Ex Toto Corde Tuo - Love God with All Your Heart

episode of.title: The Long Ride Home with Bear Woznick (TV Series 2017– )

imdb.title: The Long Ride Home with Bear Woznick
akas: The Long Ride Home with Bear Woznick (United States)
plot: Bear Woznick and Tony Orband roll on their motorcycles from the Atlantic to the Pacific on the route that Bear pedaled his bike15 years earlier. Bear returns to his youth on the shores of Calif. They join other bikers and seek brotherhood.::Bear Woznick
